fi.lrkr.pathfinder.pathfinder.heuristic

Interface Heuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Manhattan, ManhattanCross, ManhattanNudged

    public interface Heuristic
    Interface for different Heuristic implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateHScore(Vertex v1, Vertex v2, Vertex v3)
      Calculates the Heuristic score between Current and End vertex.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateHScore

        double calculateHScore(Vertex v1,
                       Vertex v2,
                       Vertex v3)
        Calculates the Heuristic score between Current and End vertex. Some Heuristics will also use Start Vertex.
        Parameters:
        v1 - Current Vertex
        v2 - End Vertex
        v3 - Start Vertex
        Returns:
        heuristic score
